metadata.title: CVE-2019-18889 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Symfony 3.4.0 through 3.4.34, 4.2.0 through4.2.11, and 4.3.0 through 4.3.7. Serializing certain cache adapterinterfaces could result in remote code injection. This is related tosymfony/cache.

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
